name: Unrivaled Spear Demon
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhwa
content: Shuji, a soldier who danced with death many times while on the battlefield, was possessed by the grudges and resentment of those he had killed. He too was eventually killed, but somehow he awoke in a younger version of himself.He returned to a time when he was still an errand boy, inexperienced with war, but retained his memories.
